reviewText: This is by far the cheapest way to get the Complete Bat Masterson TV series. Season 3 Episode 22 "Terror on the Trinity" is not included due to licensing reasons -- which is a shame. The quality of the episodes are very good, picture sharp and clear. Though it does not say but the episodes seem to have been remastered. I'm going to enjoy watching this complete series for the first time. They just don't make TV this good anymore. Gene Barry does an excellent job of playing Bat Masterson.

Purchased this item based on picture, and contents , States Collecters Edition, What i recieved was 6 seperate dvds that made up complete series, Sent back & replacement was sent, recieved the replacement and recieved the same identcials items that i returned...Pictured are the discs i recieved ,Not as pictured
It was for my sister, who is a fan of Bat Masterson. She loves the dvd's good quality, and also the bonus movies. Thanks!
This was a gift. She loves them so much.

I bought this item for my dad who is a big western series fan. This was one he used to watch on TV all the time. Now he likes the idea of getting to watch it whenever he wants too. It has all his favorite episodes and more. This series feature a gentlemen gambler who solves problems, usually involving death. It is a great show for western fans.
I am a fan of Gene Barry.  I fully love the Bat Masterson TV series.  I love how he uses his long cane in taking away the criminal's guns.
These DVD sets are great to see again after so many years. Good period acting hangs in here.
Loved getting to watch this old western series.

BM was my favorite Western when I was a kid. I'm glad I bought this CD collection but after watching almost all episodes I found out that some are just incomplete prints of the originals (a minority of the episodes to be honest with) they lack English subtitles which in my opinion is a disadvantage if you like to quietly watch them at night without disturbing other people.
Gene ack Barry is just great and it'd brings back the fun in watching TV.
it was great, my husband watches them every day
Husband loves it. Brings back childhood memories.
Bat Masterson the series, just excellent.
My mom is thrilled this is available.
